configuration.title: Embedded VS Code for NVIDIA Omniverse

remoteSocket.extensionIp.description: IP address where the remote Omniverse application is running

remoteSocket.extensionPort.markdownDescription: Port used by the *Embedded VS Code for NVIDIA Omniverse* extension in the remote Omniverse application

localSocket.extensionPort.markdownDescription: Port used by the *Embedded VS Code for NVIDIA Omniverse* extension in the local Omniverse application

output.clearBeforeRun.markdownDescription: Whether to clear the output before run the code. If unchecked (`false`), the output will be appended to the existing content

output.carbLogging.markdownDescription: Whether to enable carb logging to be displayed in the *Embedded VS Code for NVIDIA Omniverse (carb logging)* output panel. Changes will take effect after reloading the window

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
